ComicInfo.Title: The Dream Eater Saga Part 5
ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales: The Dream Eater Saga: Neverland
ComicInfo.Summary: Pan finds himself trapped on Earth retaining only a fraction of the power he once possessed. But when Pan learns of the Dream Eater’s arrival on Earth he formulates a plan to reclaim his throne and regain the power he once had. Part five of the event that will change the Grimm Fairy Tales Universe forever is here.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-15 16:47:37. [CVDB294517]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alé Garza, Ivan Nunes, Khary Randolph, Pasquale Qualano, Sanju Nivangune
ComicInfo.Characters: Magelica, Pan, Sea Witch, Tinker Belle
